name: Me, myself and Herbert
description:
You are Herbert, the ex-garbage collector who suffers from multiple personality disorder. He has 4 personalities that he can randomly switch to. With each character comes a different special ability. 

Herbert (45 years old) is the main character and a former garbage man. He can hide in trash cans.

 Lilly (9 years) is a little girl who is currently attending elementary school. Her favorite things are horses and sweets. She can jump very high. 

Ludmila: (56 years old) is Lilly's teacher and she has a soft x-ray that makes it easier for the player to spot the target. 

Riccardo (22 years) is a stripper and because he is not wearing pants he is very quick and can escape the guards. 

Mr. X (Age: 1 million) All he wants is to rule the world and fulfill his dream of bringing the Lizardmen to the head of every government in the world. He is the only one who can pass black doors.

_______________________________________________________________________________________

Controlls: 

You move with WASD / Left Stick

Sprint with Shift / Left Trigger

Jump with Space / Button South

Hide in trash cans with E / Button Right

_______________________________________________________________________________________

This game was created by Tim Keil (Level Design/ Programming / Sound), Sebastian Kühn ( Programming) and Emily Panzer (3D Art / Animation / 2D Art) while participating in the Sping Jam 2021 of the university of Bayreuth. We worked on it for 2 days. We hope you have fun with the game ^^
